org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.nfs.nfs3

Class Nfs3HttpServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.nfs.nfs3.Nfs3HttpServer

  •  class Nfs3HttpServer
extends Object
    Encapsulates the HTTP server started by the NFS3 gateway.
